Articles.Content:
In this thread you post jokes similar to Chuck Norris jokes but instead about Jebediah. Here are a few examples:

Jebediah once did a perfect 3 point landing in a plane with 2 wheels.

Jebediah has circumnavigated Kerbin in a trash can.

Jebediah can land a space plane with no wings.

Jebediah doesn't fear the Kraken, the Kraken fears Jebediah.

Anyway, have fun!
Jebediah can have fun while playing career mode in the stock game

Jebediah can have fun while playing career mode in the stock game

*SHOTS FIRED*

Jeb can smash into Eeloo at 300 km/s and use his ship's explosion to safely return to Kerbin.
You can't find Jeb, he will find you instead
Jebediah once flew in a rocket so big that instead of lifting off of Kerbin it stayed still while Kerbin moved down.
Jebediah once finished Tour de Krance... on a stationary bicycle...
Jebediah can get into low Kerbin orbit with a paper clip and a match.
Chuck noris can survive a car hit. Jebediah can survive jumping out of a plane from 5000000 ft ( I tested) WITHOUT a parachute and can survive getting hit by a Saturn V right after that.
Jeb can drop into water and then get hit by a plane at mach 3.

Jebediah can skydive into water on a science lab and the water would die

Edited September 7, 2015 by EdusacconBR
Jen can land a capsule with no parachutes.
Jeb dosen't fly, Kerbin drops out beneath him
Jedediah can go to Moho and have enough fuel left for the return trip.
Jeb can survive an interplanetary re-entry without getting scraped.
Jeb tyrannizes the rocket equation.

Jeb can get into orbit with just his jetpack..

...from Jool's surface.
Jeb is the most interesting man in the world. Even his own mother has a tattoo that says "Jeb"
When Jeb flies in a rocket, the rocket doesn't dare not work properly.
When Jeb is in the cockpit, if infinite fuel automatically switches on.
Jen is offended that mech-jeb is named after him because no AI can live up to his standards.

Jen is offended that mech-jeb is named after him because no AI can live up to his standards.

He is also offended that you misspelled his name.
I got nothing because he is so badass that he stole my idea.
Jeb once died but he's alright now.

Jeb once died but he's alright now.

Can he die?

Can he die?

Yes, and no.
